attributes.name: dialogAction
attributes.description: Actions close the `mwc-dialog` on click. You can define an action by slotting an element with the `dialogAction="..."` string attribute. The name of the attribute can be customized by the `actionAttribute` property. When a clickable element with the `dialogAction` attribute is clicked, `mwc-dialog` will get the value of the attribute and fire the `closing` and subsequent `closed` events with a detail of `{action: <clickedElement.getAttribute('dialogAction')>}`.

attributes.name: dialogInitialFocus
attributes.description: `mwc-dialog` initial focus can be set on an element with the `dialogInitialFocus` boolean attribute (configurable via the `initialFocusAttribute` property of `mwc-dialog`.

slots.description: Default content to display between both icons and after label. __NOTE:__ It is highly recommended to set the `label` property instead of projecting text as it will also set the `aria-label`

slots.name: trailingIcon
slots.description: Icon to show _after_ the label. Overrides `trailingIcon` property. Use `label` or the `trailingIcon` property to set the `aria-label`.

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Leading icon. Overrides `icon` property. Use `label` or the `icon` property to set the `aria-label`.
Primary content area. May contain a list, a form, or prose.

slots.name: primaryAction
slots.description: Footer area containing the dialog's primary action button.

slots.name: secondaryAction
slots.description: Footer area containing the dialog's secondary action button.

slots.name: title
slots.description: Header title to display in the drawer when `hasHeader` is true.

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: Header subtitle to display in the drawer when `hasHeader` is true.

slots.name: header
slots.description: Additional header elements to display in the drawer.

slots.name: appContent
slots.description: Elements to display in the "app content" to the right of, or under, the drawer.
Elements to display under the header in drawer.

slots.name: icon
slots.description: An icon to be slotted into the fab. _Note:_ the `label` property should still be set for button accessibility.
The input element that this form field provides a label for.
The name of the icon to display (e.g. `shopping_cart`). See [Material Icons](https://material.io/resources/icons/) for an index of all available icons.
Optional `` or `

slots.name: onIcon
slots.description: Optional `` or `

slots.name: offIcon
slots.description: Optional `` or `
Content to display in the lists internal `<ul>` element.

slots.name: graphic
slots.description: First tile graphic to display when `graphic` attribute is defined.

slots.name: meta
slots.description: Last tile meta icon or text to display when `hasMeta` is true.

slots.name: secondary
slots.description: Secondary text displayed below primary text of a two-line list item.
Primary text to display in the list item. Note, text must be wrapped in an inline node to be styled for `disabled` variant.
Content to display in the menus internal `<mwc-list>` element.
Content to display in the selects internal `<mwc-menu>` element.

slots.name: action
slots.description: Optional `<mwc-button>` which closes the snackbar with reason `'action'`.

slots.name: dismiss
slots.description: Optional `<mwc-icon-button>` which closes the snackbar with reason `'dismiss'`.

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Slotted icon to display. Only available if `hasImageIcon` or `icon` are defined.
[`mwc-tab`](https://github.com/material-components/material-web/tree/master/packages/tab) elements to display.

slots.name: actionItems
slots.description: A number of `<mwc-icon-button>` elements to use for action icons on the right side. _NOTE:_ If using with `mwc-drawer`, please read note under [`Standard` drawer example](https://github.com/material-components/material-web/tree/master/packages/top-app-bar).

slots.name: navigationIcon
slots.description: One `<mwc-icon-button>` element to use for the left icon.

slots.name: title
slots.description: A `<div>` or `<span>` that will be used as the title text.
Scrollable content to display under the bar. This may be the entire application.

slots.name: actionItems
slots.description: A number of `<mwc-icon-button>` elements to use for action icons on the right side. _NOTE:_ If using with `mwc-drawer`, please read note under [`Standard` drawer example](https://github.com/material-components/material-web/tree/master/packages/top-app-bar).

slots.name: navigationIcon
slots.description: One `<mwc-icon-button>` element to use for the left icon.

slots.name: title
slots.description: A `<div>` or `<span>` that will be used as the title text.
Scrollable content to display under the bar. This may be the entire application.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-primary
properties.description: Text and icons on top of a theme primary color background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-secondary
properties.description: Text and icons on top of a theme secondary color background.

properties.name: --mdc-theme-on-surface
properties.description: Text and icons on top of a theme surface color background.
